---
title: "My First Scatter Plot"
format: pdf
---



```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]

plt.scatter(x, y)
plt.title("My First Scatter Plot")
plt.xlabel("X Values")
plt.ylabel("Y Values")

# Save the plot to a file so Quarto can include it
plt.savefig("scatter.pdf")  
```
